name: Legacy of Angels
description:
A complete remake, revamp, and redone story for A Sister Adventure; Legacy of Angels is about 3 young women all connected in one way or another and a man who's twin is going on a rampage via his master, Deathbringer. But the question is why? Why is any of this happening? Who, or what, is Deathbringer? In this Rpg maker MZ game you will be immersed in mystery, comedy, romance and danger as this group of 3 women and one man search for answers and save the land from Deathbringer.   

THIS IS A DEMO AND THE OFFICIAL RELEASE IS TBA. If you have issues, please let me know.
